mapper.select: SELECT u.user_code, r.user_role_name, d.dept_name, u.user_created_date, u.user_expired_date FROM user_info u JOIN user_role r USING (user_role_id) JOIN dept d USING (dept_code) LIMIT #{offset}, #{count}

SELECT u.user_code, j.job_name, d.dept_name, r.user_role_name, u.user_name, u.email, u.phone FROM user_info u JOIN job j USING (job_code) JOIN dept d USING (dept_code) JOIN user_role r USING (user_role_id) WHERE u.user_code = #{userCode}
